name: Descript
tagline: Edit audio and video by editing text
description: Descript offers AI-powered transcription and editing that lets you edit media files as easily as editing a document.
about: Descript revolutionizes audio and video editing by letting you edit multimedia content through text transcription. Remove filler words automatically, clone your voice for corrections, create audiograms, and collaborate in real-time. It's like editing a document but you're editing audio and video.
